reviews.review: there are indeed portals in this game :)
Very cool. One of the best games ever, the story is good and every level is good and packed with story. The CO-OP is also very good. Hopefully, Valve starts making F-stop. Please buy this if you can

you're not gonna find a better classic puzzle game like this anywhere else, especially not one with a great co-op as well

One of the best games ever made with great physics, easy to understand mechanics, loads of secrets and easter eggs and a really good and interesting story and lore. Just a lot of fun in single player and multiplayer with friends.
My favourite game ever, It has a lot of replay-ability and is very fun to play with friends. I do have one issue where the game caps at 30 fps but it's fine by me.
pls portal 3 for the love of god
Its very funny game singeplayer very good coop is epic trolling
When I started speedrunning this I was a loser, that's the same but at least I know how to beat this game fast

Ok i never do serious reviews but here we go. Holy shit, if you've never played the game, buy this shit RIGHT NOW. This is not a forgetfull experience at all. The charm the characters have is funny, and even sad. This game almost had me in tears at the end. I love this game and its easily the best game ive played period. This series has had such a large impact on the game industry as a whole. The voices are amazingly done, and i think this is the gold standard for video games. 10/10 i recommend this game
If you have never played this game before, you have missed out, this is my favorite puzzle game of all time
